name: Jumpless
description:
Jumpless

Little 2D platformer puzzle game

Description

And if you are running out of space bar?

Can you reach the end in this way?

Test yourself in this 6-level-minigame challenge!

Controls

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

RIGHT CTRL or LEFT MOUSE BUTTON  to dash

Author

Francisco Castro - https://github.com/chicomcastro

Used assets

PC2D - https://github.com/cjddmut/Unity-2D-Platformer-Controller
